attributes.action: Reduce MP's Pay and allowances for any unspent convictions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that MP's salaries are reduced by 20% for each unspent conviction they have, we think this should be increased to 40% reduction for serious convictions. This would represent justice and fairness as they are paid with TAX payers monies and would show more respect for the payers of the wage bill. This would also be in line with government policy elsewhere

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
